ygData.subject: Re: Yipee
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night whilst in Oasis (South Ro zone) me and my level 31 friend were trying to pull Spectres (failing because 2+ always came), we was the only people at
ygData.messageBody:
Last night whilst in Oasis (South Ro zone) me and my level 31 friend were
trying to pull Spectres (failing because 2+ always came), we was the only
people at this zone other than a 45 enchanter who was killing SG's, then a
Young Ranger came running to the zone with a DW Goblins Pet, which he
killed and as I saw the pet I immediately thought about the DW Goblin
coming to help it. And there it was, a greenie blue thing from over the
dune, I ran in and it hit me hard, lost a bubble of health almost
immediately, but then my mage friend cast Malice and I could Fear/Chain it
whilst he blasted and his pet kicked it in, along with the help from me and
a few staff procs, we took it down with very little health loss (me 2 bubbs
and my friedn 1 bub). I looted and oh yes 1 Opalline helm. Now all I need
is the Mudwater rune however I don't really like cazic.

Overall last night was bad for me, I died twice (once in Lower Guk - mino
trained on me) and (2 SG's killed me almost instantly at the S Ro zone) and
ended up at a 1/2 bubble loss. I'm now KOS to froggies so that sucks, I now
have to invis when going through upper guk <sighs>.

After 2 weeks I've come very close to obtaining my fulll suit of Lambent,
only 1 bracer and the helm to go, I have the DB Bracelet and Opalline helm
now, I just need some money for gems and the last 2 items. I doubt I will
wear my Lambent Helm and Bracers though, the stats on my SSB and +5 Dex +3
Str bracers are nicer. I just want the helm and bracers for when I am
charming stuff and for general roleplay to look good eg. weddings etc.

Madagan, Bard of 29 songs and staying that way.
